titles.title: Legal Immigrant Children's Health Improvement Act of 2007

A bill to amend title XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to permit States the option of coverage of legal immigrants under the Medicaid Program and the State Children's Health Insurance Program (SCHIP)

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2630)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/5/2007--Introduced.
Legal Immigrant Children's Health Improvement Act of 2007 - Amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to grant states the option of covering certain categories of eligible pregnant women and child resident aliens, including targeted low-income children, under the Medicaid and SCHIP programs.
